line.text: Thine eyes I love and they as pitying me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Knowing thy heart torment me with disdain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Have put on black and loving mourners be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Looking with pretty ruth upon my pain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And truly not the morning sun of heaven
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Better becomes the grey cheeks of the east
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor that full star that ushers in the even
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Doth half that glory to the sober west
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As those two mourning eyes become thy face
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O let it then as well beseem thy heart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To mourn for me since mourning doth thee grace
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And suit thy pity like in every part
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then will I swear beauty herself is black
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And all they foul that thy complexion lack
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
